value:
$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|It's here! The Thieves' Masque!$k$pAnd today's star is none other
than me, Cath! The master of
master thieves!$k$pReach deep into those pockets
and fling your treasures at me!
Don't be shy!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Hang on a minute! You can't just
decide you're the star of the show!
I'm a master thief myself!$k$pA chivalrous thief, no less! I have
just as much right to be the star
as you. Right, Kagero?$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|I... I could not say how one would
best choose the star of a festival.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|You're a bold one, Nina, to challenge
me! Fine, then. What do you say to a
contest?$k$pLet's see which of us can shock the
other with the quality of her treasure!
I'll get one you can't help but adore!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|You're on! I'll nab a treasure that will
have you crying tears of joy!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Me and my big mouth! What kind of
treasure will shock Nina? I have no
idea.$k$pKnow your enemy... That's the key.
Now what— Oh! What timing... Leila!$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Hm? Do you need something?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|You're a spy, right? Could you...
do a little spying for me?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Here's the information you
requested.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|And here's your payment. You're
a professional, all right! Great work,
done quick.$k$pWhat's that look supposed to mean?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Look? Was I giving you a look? I don't
think so...$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Well, whatever. Thanks! This is a
HUGE help.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|What she'll need to steal to shock
Nina... It's beyond anything I could
imagine.$k$pI must not let that girl anywhere
near Matthew.$k$p$Sbs150|
